list.name: Changes
list.comment:
git add .github/workflows/build.yml git commit -m "ci: add GitHub Actions workflow for Windows build
- Add automated Windows executable build using PyInstaller - Configure GitHub Actions to create single executable file - Set up artifact upload for built application - Trigger builds on main branch pushes and pull requests" git push

task.summary:
feat: improve vector plot visualization and PDF export
- Replace matplotlib-based VectorPlot with QGraphicsScene-based VectorPlotView - Implement proper scaling and aspect ratio for vector diagrams - Add grid layout (3 columns) with vertical scrolling - Fix diagram proportions and sizing issues - Improve PDF export functionality for both vector and deviation plots
Technical changes: - Add new VectorPlotView class with QGraphicsScene for better rendering - Implement proper resize handling with aspect ratio preservation - Add improved error handling and memory management - Update main window to handle new plot view implementation - Add grid layout with proper spacing and margins - Optimize plot rendering performance
File changes: + src/views/vector_plot_view.py - src/views/vector_plot.py * src/views/main_window.py * src/utils/pdf_export_handler.py

feat: improve vector plot visualization and PDF export
- Replace matplotlib-based VectorPlot with QGraphicsScene-based VectorPlotView - Implement proper scaling and aspect ratio for vector diagrams - Add grid layout (3 columns) with vertical scrolling - Fix diagram proportions and sizing issues - Improve PDF export functionality for both vector and deviation plots
Technical changes: - Add new VectorPlotView class with QGraphicsScene for better rendering - Implement proper resize handling with aspect ratio preservation - Add improved error handling and memory management - Update main window to handle new plot view implementation - Add grid layout with proper spacing and margins - Optimize plot rendering performance
File changes: + src/views/vector_plot_view.py - src/views/vector_plot.py * src/views/main_window.py * src/utils/pdf_export_handler.py

feat: improve vector plot visualization and PDF export
- Replace matplotlib-based VectorPlot with QGraphicsScene-based VectorPlotView - Remove obsolete vector_plot.py file

git add .github/workflows/build.yml git commit -m "ci: add GitHub Actions workflow for Windows build
- Add automated Windows executable build using PyInstaller - Configure GitHub Actions to create single executable file - Set up artifact upload for built application - Trigger builds on main branch pushes and pull requests" git push
